name: West
description:
Discover the meaning of WEST. Explore the vast world to find clues, artifacts and much more. Do you even know what WEST is? Main story will take you around the world to let you explore places you probably would miss without it and meet new characters to trade valuable items with. Along the way you will encounter enemies and other dangerous creatures.

New content can be unlocked during the main story or on some side stories. Let us know if you find the answer to WEST...




  • Craft everything you need to survive along the way.
  • Harvest food, materials and other things in order to see the next day.
  • Quests and missions is a big part of the game. You can either just follow the main story or explore side stories of characters or professions.
  • Build a shelter, a home or a massive fortress. It's all up to you how you wanna live.
  • Battle other players on a multiplayer server to see who is the strongest.
